cta.title: Behind Every Team Is A Roar Of Fans
cta.subtitle: Fans are the backbone of every team, but can they rise up to the challenges ahead? Enter the world of KBOOM and compete for your favorite teams.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: Our trusted Partners helping us in breaking the barriers between Teams and Players!

features.title: Your Ultimate Fan Experience
features.description: KBOOM makes every moment count. You are not just a Fan, you are a part of the team!

list.title: Complete Quests
list.description: Complete Quests for your favorite teams and win K-Coins and Gem which you can use to claim your favorite team's Merch!

list.title: Rank Up The Leaderboard
list.description: Show your competitive spirit to climb up the leaderboard and win the spoils. Each win gets you a step closer to that exclusive merch or 1v1!

list.title: Exclusive Experiences
list.description: A 1v1 Vs your favorite player? A 30-minute speed coaching with Gamers Origin coach? Cheer and play your way to earn never seen before rewards.

list.title: Customize Your Avatar
list.description: Tailor your profile to match your favorite team and customize your own Avatar to reflect the type of gamer you truly are!

engage.description: KBOOM makes following your favorite teams and engaging with them easy. Choose your teams, add them to your roster, and engage with each of their Quests. Completing multiple Quests can get you ranked up in your team's favor! But be warned, not all Quests are created equal...

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our
newsletter.subtitle: Newsletter
newsletter.description: We know, you can't wait for KBOOM to go live... To make the wait go by a little smoother, join our weekly newsletter, offering an immersive dive into the esports world. Whether you're a hardcore gamer, a casual fan, or just curious about this booming industry, our newsletter has something for everyone.

about.paragraph1: Started in March 2023, in the gaming room of one of the Founders, KBOOM sought to change the way Esports was viewed. Born from an idea that a Fan can be more than just a supporter, He is the roar in the crowd, The motivation behind each trophy and the hand to raise those whom fall.
about.paragraph2: KBOOM allows users to Quest and Adventure for their favorite Esports Clubs, to win exclusive experiences with their favorite players and bleed the colors of their team for the world to know where they belong. KBOOM is the bridge between teams and Fans.
